articles.title: Kate and William stun shop workers with secret visit for first engagement since lockdown - Express
articles.description: KATE, Duchess of Cambridge, has come out of self-isolation for the first time in three months for a socially-distanced face-to-face engagement, following in the footsteps of many other senior royals.
